data.author: Vivienne Ming
data.quote: What drives success, and the most successful students, is internal motivation.

data.author: Orison Swett Marden
data.quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours.

data.author: Ben Okri
data.quote: Our time here is magic! It's the only space you have to realize whatever it is that is beautiful, whatever is true, whatever is great, whatever is potential, whatever is rare, whatever is unique, in. It's the only space.

data.author: Leo Buscaglia
data.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

data.author: James Allen
data.quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?

data.author: K. Flay
data.quote: Even successful musicians have had periods where people say they suck and no one likes them, even after they've had periods of great success. So I think it's like you just gotta do you and try to stay motivated. Until, you know, you decide to stay home and make spaghetti all day.

data.author: River Phoenix
data.quote: We are taught to consume. And that's what we do. But if we realized that there really is no reason to consume, that it's just a mind set, that it's just an addiction, then we wouldn't be out there stepping on people's hands climbing the corporate ladder of success.

data.author: Alexander the Great
data.quote: I wish that the Indians believed me a god, for upon the report of an enemy's valor oftentimes depends the success of a battle, and false reports have many times done as great things as true courage and resolution.

data.author: Charlotte Bronte
data.quote: Men judge us by the success of our efforts. God looks at the efforts themselves.

data.author: Trevor Phillips
data.quote: I think there's an awful lot of noise about the Church being persecuted but there is a more real issue that the conventional churches face - that the people who are really driving their revival and success believe in an old-time religion which, in my view, is incompatible with a modern, multi-ethnic, multicultural society.

data.author: Adriana Trigiani
data.quote: You never know when some small thing will lead to a big idea. Travel is very inspirational - but it's in the ordinary that I find my themes of love and work and family.

data.author: Johannes Brahms
data.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.

data.author: R. Kelly
data.quote: I am very conscious of who I am as an artist and as an inspirational person.

data.author: Persius
data.quote: He conquers who endures.

data.author: Norman Ralph Augustine
data.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.

data.author: Bill Bradley
data.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.

data.author: Dale Carnegie
data.quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
